commands: [[ -z $(opkg list-installed | grep -qw 'node') ]] && export RESULT='The_package_has_been_installed'|| export RESULT1='The_package_is_not_found'
[[ $RESULT=='The_package_is_not_found' ]] && [[ -z $(while ! opkg install node; do echo 'Retrying...'; done | grep -qw 'Configuring node') ]] && RESULT='The_package_has_been_installed'
